pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, May 20, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, May 20, 2017:

Edmonton, Alberta

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit with families at the TELUS World of Science to highlight the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

TELUS World of Science
11211 142 Street NW
Edmonton, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit
  • Open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with the Council of India Societies of Edmonton.

9225 28 Avenue NW
Edmonton, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the roundtable
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.


Note: all times local
